LanguageData.ShardTech.label: refined crystalline shard
LanguageData.ShardTech.description: Allows you to build Yunhwa precision's weapons and armors.
LanguageData.MicrowaveTech.label: microwave emitter
LanguageData.MicrowaveTech.description: Allows you to build the mircrowave emmiter
LanguageData.MoltenTech.label: micro furnace
LanguageData.MoltenTech.description: Allows you to build the Jotun Interstellar's weapons and armors.
LanguageData.SiegeTech.label: siege gun
LanguageData.SiegeTech.description: Allows you to build the portable siege gun.
LanguageData.KineticTech.label: kinetic energy conservation gel
LanguageData.KineticTech.description: It is a prerequisite to build Tisiphone equipment.
LanguageData.FocusTech.label: focused kinetic field
LanguageData.FocusTech.description: Allows you to build the portable reactor and kinetic lance.
LanguageData.DefenceTech.label: tactical equipment manufacturing
LanguageData.DefenceTech.description: Allows you to build Graydale weapons
LanguageData.DirectedEMP.label: directed electromagnetic pulse
LanguageData.DirectedEMP.description: It is a prerequisite to build EMP rifle.
